attributes.action: rename London Heathrow Airport as "Sir Winston Churchill International Airport"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: During the twelve months to April 2007 67.35 million passengers passed through London Heathrow Airport, making it arguably the world's busiest international airport. In a 2002 BBC poll 447,423 people voted Sir Winston Churchill "the greatest Briton of all time". It would be a fitting tribute to have Britain's gateway airport named after the greatest ever Briton.
